original_text: And it came to pass in Iconium, that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews, and so spake, that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed.
korean_text: 이에 이고니온에서 두 사도가 함께 유대인의 회당에 들어가 말하니 유대와 헬라의 허다한 무리가 믿더라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in Iconium
that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews
that a great multitude both of Jews and also of Greeks believed
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인과 헬라인의 큰 무리가 믿게 되었다
